exam.question: He is always here; it’s ____ you’ve never met him.

answer.explain: 奇怪的， 不平常的， 不可思议的。句意： 他一直在这里， 奇怪的是你从来没碰见过他。rare： 稀奇的， 罕见的； peculiar： 古怪的， 怪癖的； 独特的。

sentences.sContent: a unique opportunity to study these rare creatures
sentences.sCn: 研究这些珍稀动物的难得机会

sentences.sContent: ...it has gradually evolved into a unique element of Chinese culture.As the national treasure...
...People and homes are showing great change as more and more unique handcrafted items become available...
...yellow is an important color because of its unique symbolic meaning...
...They prefer something unique and they demand quality...
...Each of these has unique qualities as well...
...or is there something unique about it...
...And taking into consideration the unique needs of their communities...

synos.tran: 独特的，稀罕的；[数]唯一的，独一无二的

phrases.pCn: 唯一机会；极难得的机会

remMethod.val: uni(单一) ＋ que(…的) → 唯一的， 独一无二的

words.tran: 独特性；独一无二；单值性

trans.tranCn: 唯一的， 独一无二的； 极不寻常的， 极好的
